attributes.action: Allow key workers to take their driving tests and continue with lessons
attributes.additional_details: Taking public transport during such uncertain times with two new strains of COVID-19 is frightening for a lot of key/ critical workers. Travelling to work via public transport increases key workers interaction with the public and in turn heightens the risk of contracting COVID-19 and passing it on to family members and colleagues who may even be vulnerable to the virus.
attributes.background: I want the Government to allow all Key Workers in all tiers to continue with driving lessons and take their practical driving tests.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
